text: Zygmunt Hanusik (28 February 1945 – 4 March 2021) was a Polish cyclist. He competed in the individual road race at the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Śląskie, Poland. Hanusik died on 4 March 2021 in Katowice, Poland at aged 76.Kolarstwo. Zygmunt Hanusik nie żyje ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Polish cyclists
title: Zygmunt Hanusik
